text: evarkal iman kontu, avarkalutaiya cantatiyarum imanil avarkalaip pin totarkirarkalo, avarkalutaiya anta cantatiyanarai avarkalutan (cuvanattil onru) certtu vituvom. (Itanal) avarkalutaiya ceyalkalil enta onraiyum, nam avarkalukkuk kuraittu vita mattom - ovvoru manitanum tan campatitta ceyalkalukkup pinaiyaka irukkinran
